string.text: The wind from the North of the Zone has brought radioactive dust and dirt with it. It's more phony than usual, you should bring radiation medicine or a respirator. Or better yet, both. Note: [Radiation Strength = 0.01 * Location Level * 1].

A terrible hurricane wind from the North of the Zone brought with it a lot of radioactive dust and dirt. It's so foggy that it makes me feel like wearing lead underwear. I'm not going in without a coverall, to hell with it. Note: [Radiation Strength = 0.01 * Location Level * 2]

There's talk of a military detachment being seen there. I don't know what the hell they're doing there, but they're on the prowl. We could bribe the military through an informant to ignore me. It's gonna cost a lot of money, though.

There's talk of mercenary units being seen out there. They're probably doing some kind of work for themselves. We could bribe the mercs through an informant to ignore me. But they're pretty fucked up on the rates.
A few of our guys just went there on their own business. Well, it's more fun together. Maybe they'll cover me.
There's chatter on the air that there's monochrome out there right now. You gotta be careful, you can't negotiate with them.

Fucking bros are at it again, checking out my stalker brother. Where the fuck do they come from? Bastards. Of course, we could negotiate with them right away, through the informant. It's unpleasant, but no gunfire.

There's a rumor on the air that a scientific expedition has moved into this sector. It would be a good idea to pocket a couple of detectors if they're unlucky enough to get away. although I'd hate to disappoint Herman.

Word on the street is that Sidorovich's runner is out there right now. He might have some loot on him. But it's not worth upsetting the old stingy guy, he might remember and let some bastards on the trail.
Stalkers on the air are saying they've seen some serious critters out there. And it's a hungry bastard, already ate our squad for lunch. Maybe to hell with it, I'll go next time...?
Bunch of lousy dogs. I don't know if they're there to feed or just on vacation. Either way, if I go, I'm taking my shotgun. And a captain-grenade will come in handy, too.

Damn things came out of their holes. There must have been a herd of hogs passing through there, cause the whole herd went out to feed. The main thing is not to arrive at lunchtime, or you risk becoming a snack.

Stalkers on the air are talking about seeing the Controller. I don't know if it's a fairy tale or for real, but I hear two loners have already been taken to the outer perimeter. With marmalade for brains.

It's a strange thing. Some people on the air blabber that they've seen bandits in trench coats. Others say it's some kind of dwarfs that came out of the ground. Whether they're lying or serious, I don't know.

There's a report on the air that two of our squads got chewed up. And the weird thing is, it's like the critters are starting to swarm. All kinds things that usually hunt alone. The people who went there were serious, experienced, so if I go there, I'll have to be careful.

Folks on the air are saying that a whole bunch of mutants are fleeing the North. I don't know what or who they're running from, but on the air. that's what they call a "rush." They're just rushing to get as far away from the North as they can, they smell something.

There is information on the air that a whole army of zombified people has gone to those places. I don't know if something's been tweaked something in their brains or if someone's running this army, but I'm not going to go through with it. Where's my sniper rifle?

That's crazy. They're saying there's a whole herd of pseudo-giants out there. One particularly big one, about the size of two. They say he's the leader. I mean, they're crazy, how is that even possible?
